attributes.action: Don’t increase the income threshold for people on student and graduate visas
attributes.additional_details: Fresh graduates are struggling to get an offer from companies that can offer more than £38,700. The Government shouldn't abolish the New Entrant scheme which will be a kind of relaxation for the people on either student or graduate visas.
attributes.background: The government should not impose the new immigration rule (skilled workers visa) on people already in the UK on either Student or Graduate visas.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654156
